profileMissing: Welcome {{- name}}, you have no profile yet
profileImageRandom: Pick a random picture from Wikimedia Commons
profileImageError: Error, the picture must be up to 400 kb
profileImageMandatory: You must use a profile image
profileMessageMandatory: You must use a profile message
profileNameMandatory: You must use a profile name
untrustworthySafe: Important! It seems that the data come from an untrustworthy source! The server signature is invalid.
untrustworthyOpenMessage: Are you sure you want to continue?
